job.title: Software Engineer II
job.description: stronguPosition Summary What Youll DobrbrustrongAs a Software Engineer II on the Global Workforce Management tech team you will help develop the future of workforce tools You will be joining an amazing team of engineers developing cloudbased microservices using NodeJS and Java The systems and platforms you will contribute to will have significant impact across all retail sectors becoming the next generation of workforce management Working with business partners you will champion developmentarchitectural bestpractices rapidly scaling the platform across international marketplaces in a fun collaborative fastpaced environmentbrbrWhat youll dobrulliPartner with several teams to develop technical components and deploying microservices and eventbased systems to publicprivate cloud environments across the globeliliCollaborate with other software engineers on the various layers of infrastructure for our applications using your experience with NodeJS Java Spring and DockerliliThrive in a fastmoving team writing solid scalable quality reusable code liliApply software development practices such as CICD TDD Scrum AgileliliDevelop innovation strategies processes and best practiceslili1 years developing APIs eventbased workflow microservices with NodeJS and JavaliliExperience with Azure cloud architecture DevOps CICD HighAvailability AutoScaling and IaCIaaSliliExperience working with Docker Kubernetes and NoSqlliliStrong logging and Quality experience implementing automated testing platforms and unit testsliliProficient in Git Jira SCRUMbrliulBenefits amp PerksbrbrBeyond competitive pay you can receive incentive awards for your performance Other great perks include 401k match stock purchase plan paid maternity and parental leave PTO multiple health plans and much morebrbrEqual Opportunity EmployerbrbrWalmart Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employer  By Choice We believe we are best equipped to help our associates customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them That means understanding respecting and valuing diversity unique styles experiences identities ideas and opinions  while being inclusive of all peoplebrbrstronguAbout Global TechbrbrustrongImagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech Were a team of 15000 software engineers data scientists and service professionals within Walmart the worlds largest retailer delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 22 million associates To others innovation looks like an app service or some code but Walmart has always been about people People are why we innovate and people power our innovations Being humanled is our true disruptionbrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongememOutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no minimum qualifications brbrememBachelors degree in Computer Science and 1 years experience in software engineering or related field OR 3 years experience in software engineering or related field Preferred QualificationsbrbrememOutlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no preferred qualifications brbrememPrimary
